reviews.reviewBody:
I just started my Invisilign treatment 3 days ago.  They do hurt some when you take them out and put them back in after eating, but I can feel my teeth moving already and that's exciting.
My treatment is almost an express case, the bottom teeth will be completely fixed in 2.5 months and the top ones in 7 months.
Yesterday I asked my dentist to show me the very last tray, and that got me very...

The physicians as well as every member of the staff always provide exceptional professional service. They're courteous, well trained and always willing to go the extra mile to make sure I'm comfortable with and fully understand every procedure and product.
 I had my first Halo...

reviews.name: Mom of 4,banker - Fairhope, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I was concerned about wrinkles and texture of my skin. I went to see Shirley at Haley Dermatology/Clear Medspa and she was awesome!  She explained the treatment & healing in great length. I did the treatment and was very swollen and red on day2 but each day it got better and better. After 1 month it looked great! Loved the results! Tight skin and less wrinkles!

reviews.name: Pixel RF for Face - Clear Med Spa - Fairhope, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I was starting to notice some changes in my skin... wrinkles, rough skin, large pores. I had a lot of friends tell me that I needed to go visit Clear Med Spa. My experience was wonderful from start to finish. I went in for my consultation, the skin care specialist took her time and discussed all of my options.  After going home and thinking about it, I decided on the Pixel treatment. When I...

reviews.name: Haley Dermatology Rocks -AL
reviews.reviewBody:
The individuals at Haley Dermatology, as well as Dr. Haley were warm, kind, & professional throughout my entire experience. Shirley met with me twice & gave me her cell phone number in case I had any questions or concerns over the weekend before my treatment.

	After reading some negative press via the Internet I almost backed out; I am glad I did not! It's been a couple of hours...

reviews.name: Skin Tightening with Pixel RF Roller -Fairhope, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I went to Haley Dermatology for a consult about my aging skin. Dr. Haley took a lot of time explaining my treatment options. Shirley did the treatment on my face and neck. She did a great job and I have loved my results. It took me about 5 days to recover, I had redness and swelling. My skin now is smoother and tighter.

name: Elizabeth S. Jacobson, MD
specialty: Dermatologic Surgeon, Board Certified in Dermatology

reviews.name: Happy with my Doctor - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: No down time no bruise and minimal wait time! Got in the same day I called!

name: Corey L. Hartman, MD, FAAD
specialty: Dermatologic Surgeon, Board Certified in Dermatology

reviews.name: Dr. Hartman is the best
reviews.reviewBody: I've been going to Dr. Hartman for 4-5 years for regular Botox and Voluma.  I first heard about him from my girlfriend who raved about how patient he is and how he would always perform her work in a way that looked natural and fresh. He delivered all of that for me as well, so I trusted him when he told me that Coolsculpting would work for my love handles and inner thighs. The nursing staff is...

reviews.name: 39, 2 Kids, Married - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I was tired of the c-section "hang over" fat. After years of diet and exercise, I finally found something that helped me shed pesky fat around my c-section cut. I saw results just after 2 weeks. By 6 weeks, I had a new tummy! By week 12, I was completely floored by the results. I am a cool sculpting believer! Thank you Dr. Hartman and KarryAnne.

reviews.name: There is Nothing Like Kybella - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I have dealt with my double chin for years.  It's hereditary.  No matter now much weight I lost, I still looked fat in the face.  I'd tried Ultherapy and considered lipo, but then heard about Kybella and gave it a try.  The results are amazing and so fast.  I am so glad that Dr. Hartman introduced me to Kybella.  I would trust him to do anything.

reviews.name: Stubborn Belly Fat is Gone - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I'm an active, athletic mother of two who works out four times a week doing crossfit, yoga and running.  I also maintain a healthy diet low on carbs and high on protein.  Despite this strict diet and regular exercise, I could not get rid of the area in the lower part of my abdomen.  I wanted to do something to help but was not interested in surgery or liposuction.  My dermatologist advertised...

reviews.name: Much Better Than I Even Hoped for – Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I started my new year off with an amazing Fraxel treatment series. The treatment has enhanced my natural beauty to be more vibrant and cleaner. It has always been a challenge for me to control my oily sensitive skin. Because of the resurfacing and learning the correct products to use for African American women over 50; I feel great about my face every day.

name: Meg Cherry, MD
specialty: Dermatologic Surgeon, Board Certified in Dermatology

reviews.name: Tired, Working, New Mom Needing a Pick Me Up. Mountain Brook, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I wanted to do something to make me look more youthful and not so tired all the time. I use great skin care products however my main concern was tired eyes and a dull look most of the time. I wanted something to brighten and lift me up however wanted it to be conservative enough that people would notice I looked better but not quite know what exactly it was.

reviews.name: Sweaty Girl - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody:
Dr. Cherry preformed Botox injections under my arms for Hyperhidrosis.  She is a professional in every way and a pleasure to speak with during my uncomfortable procedure.  The staff was very attentive during the procedure and kept my spirits up when it was a little painful.  I highly recommend Dr. Cherry for all your dermatology needs.  

AS

reviews.name: Sculptura Not Scalpel  - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: Couldn't be happier with my sculptra injections by Dr. Cherry. After she did such an amazing job with my Botox I signed on for three rounds if sculptra. Today was my second round and I'm very pleased. The lift I have already gotten is amazing. I can't wait until round 3!

reviews.name: Best Botox in B'HAM - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I have issues with asymmetry which she corrected COMPLETELY! The injections were painless and with the VIP card and Botox coupons reasonably priced.

reviews.name: Milia Extractions - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I had a row of small cysts on my forehead. They look like pimples, but won't go away. Dr. Cherry painlessly removed them without any bruising or scaring. After a few days you couldn't even tell their was anything there to begin with. The extractions only took about fifteen minutes and I was out the door.

Bailey to you and your staff!!  Clement

reviews.name: Most caring Dr I've ever seen
reviews.reviewBody: Dr Bailey removed several squamous cell cancers using Mohs procedure. He & his staff are the best. Caring, kind, professional and makes sure you are comfortable and in no pain. Best bedside manner I've ever experienced. Love them!

reviews.name: Dr. Bailey and Jennifer were wonderful
reviews.reviewBody: Dr. Bailey and Jennifer were wonderful!! I had the best experience and have always been very happy with any procedure I have had! This visit I had CoolSculpting  and Dr. Bailey was very in depth about the procedure they made sure I was comfortable during my visit.

reviews.name: Awesome!
reviews.reviewBody: It was a great experience. Everything was explained to me and I was encouraged to ask questions. The whole office staff is super nice and helpful! He takes his time with you and listens to your concerns. I never felt rushed or felt like he was rushed. Very calming atmosphere.

I am also thinking of trying another procedure from this line since the...

reviews.reviewBody: Dr. Northington is the best. I am very pleased with the results of my treatment. She is an extremely talented doctor and I would recommend her to anyone. I often receive comment by strangers how beautiful my skin looks. Doctor Northington is the one responsible for the wonderful condition of my skin.

reviews.name: 50 Years Old, 2 Kids and Some Unwanted Baggage - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody:
The end result was more than I could ever have hoped for and am amazed at the outcome.  I am very thankful.

In the beginning I was very nervous I was not sure what to expect, however once I arrive to the doctors office and was greeted by the staff (front end / back end) I begin to feel as if I was in safe hands.  The nursing staff was efficient, pleasant and the bedside manner was beyond...

reviews.name: Great Experience! - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I went to see Dr. Northington about the brown spots on my face. She told me it was from sun damage and that IPL laser would be helpful. Her staff was great! They made sure I was comfortable while I waited for the topical numbing medication to work. The treatment itself only took 15 minutes, and Dr. Northington made sure I understood the procedure and was comfortable. Dr. Northington's staff...

I've been lucky enough to be a patient of Dr. Sawyer's for almost 6 years and have been more than pleased with her gift of aestetics as well as her wonderful, bright, and truly honest personality. I have refered several of my hard to please...

reviews.name: I left wondering why I hadn’t done this sooner!
reviews.reviewBody: Warm, friendly environment. Dr Sawyer and staff were very interested to hear my concerns and really listened to me. Very honest in the areas she could help in and those that would be better served by another specialty. Dr Sawyer is truly gifted, skilled, and passionate about what she does and it shows in her work. There was no down time due to her injection technique. I was able to leave the...

reviews.name: 37 Year Old Sculptra. Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I was hesitant to try sculptra at first because it's semi-permanent and it is by far the most beautiful filler I've ever had. I attribute this mostly to Dr. Sawyer.  She corrected volume loss in my mid and lower face, left  cheek and temples. People have commented on my skin, hair and and make up for the fist time in years and it's because Dr. Sawyer made me look like the best version of myself.

reviews.name: Best Dermatologist in Birmingham!!!
reviews.reviewBody: I have had IPL treatments several places but the results were so much better at Birmingham skin and laser!   Highly recommend this treatment for melasma and overall better skin.  I have also had injections under my eyes by Dr. Sawyer. BIt made a huge difference for circles under my eyes and looked 100% natural.  I would not trust anyone else in town for these types of procedures!!

reviews.name: Wanted Fraxel but Ended Up with Microneedling!!! - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody:
I have a round of fraxel 2 years ago and decided to get another one . But when I got to the doctor office, she said she could not do laser on me because the psoriasis flared up around my forehead and my temple!!
So she said I should try microneedling  because it won't heat up the skin and won't interfere with the active psoriasis!!
So I got my numbing cream on waited for an hour then the nurse...

reviews.reviewBody:

Im currently 3 weeks post op and am concerned about lumpy legs and skin creases. 
Hoping it doesn't lead to revision surgery. Inner thigh lipo has been my most painful procedure yet and is causing me the most doubt about the outcome.

Dr. Austin and his team were friendly, caring, and always willing to answer my many questions...

reviews.name: Already starting to look like the refreshed version of me

I'm still in week one but the artistry showing and already starting to.look like the refreshed version of me.   Operating team rocks too!

reviews.name: Gave me a new lease on life at 74
reviews.reviewBody: I am so glad a friend told me about Dr. Adams. I had never considered a facelift, but she looked great so I went for a consultation.  I also got a second opinion and the other person was less  expensive but he did not say he could rid me of the marionette lines that had been bugging me for 10 years.  Dr Adams gave me a great jaw line and rid me of the lines.  His entire staff is wonderful and...

reviews.name: Been using him since 2020
reviews.reviewBody: Dr.Adams is the only doctor I will use for anything to do with my face.  I've been using him since 2020 and can say he is the best. He injects gently and I never bruise (previous doctors left brusing on my face). He is kind and really listens to my concerns and is great at telling me his opinion and if what I'm inquiring about will or won't work for me. He is skilled at the natural look and...

reviews.name: Extremely knowledgeable and helpful
reviews.reviewBody: My experience with Dr. Adam’s is always the best anyone could have with a doctor. He is friendly, but professional. He is extremely knowledgeable and helpful. I completely trust him with whatever procedure I am asking for. He is educational in his approach, making sure you know why or who not he recommends a certain direction. I would not consider going to anyone else. I recommend him to everyone.

reviews.name: Goes above and beyond!
reviews.reviewBody: Dr Gunn is so kind and truly wants to help you achieve your goals, instead of just baiting you to come back over and over with more and more treatments. She's down-to-earth, and has done ok of my treatments herself. Most will just hand you off to a tech of one kind for a laser, filler, etc. but Dr Gunn does everything herself. She's even called me personally prior to my last laser for info....

reviews.name: My results were great - Dr. Gunn was very caring and patient
reviews.reviewBody: About six years ago, I had my BBL with Dr Gunn Dr My results were great zGunn was very current caring and patient and answer all of my questions. At this point, I am considering a BBL revision along with the tummy tuck. I will definitely post an update.

reviews.name: Belt lipectomy - results 6 weeks post-op are amazing, very caring
reviews.reviewBody:
My treatment listed here is for a Tummy Tuck because what I actually had isn't listed as a treatment.

I was referred to Heddn & Gunn Plastic Surgery by a former patient, and when I went in for the consultation, it was originally for a tummy tuck. After meeting with Dr. Gunn and talking about what I wanted, he was very informative about my particular body issues, made some recommendations,...

reviews.name: Fantastic Dr. And Staff - very helpful during healing process
reviews.reviewBody: Dr. Gunn is very personal and caring about his patients.  I was referred to another Dr.  But I am so glad I chose Dr. Gunn and his staff to assist in what I wanted.  He and his staff have been very helpful and concerning for my well being during my healing process.

reviews.name: I have been wanting this every since I had my baby
reviews.reviewBody: I have been wanting this every since I had my baby last August.  I had diastasis recti so I still looked pregnant months after and my boobs were sagging. I originally wanted to do it in Atlanta but could not get away. I researched all the surgeons here in Birmingham and Dr Gunns office had some of the best reviews. He is very sweet and personable. I am happy with my results. I do still have...

reviews.name: 4 days post-op and so far my results look amazing
reviews.reviewBody: Dr. Gunn in Birmingham AL is absolutely amazing. I'm 4dpo now. Tightness in my abdomen is really the only discomfort I'm having. So far my results look amazing. The hardest part to me has been the process of getting up. Having the BA at the same time took away the ability to use my arms for support. But by the second day PO I was able to get up without assistance.

Welcoming, ease in explaining processes and procedures… truly perfect in all aspects.

Dr. Park and his staff were so friendly, caring and eager to answer all my questions. I was diagnosed with melanoma which was located on my cheek. I am very happy with my results and wouldn't hesitate to return to them for other services, and recommend them to others.

reviews.name: My results are amazing!

reviews.name: The Best!
reviews.reviewBody: Dr. Telepun is a great doctor. I have used him twice.. Had my arm lift in 2015 and just had my Tt 5 weeks ago. He really cares and is always there if any problems come up..  I am going back in 6 weeks for my breast reduction breast lift..Everything was done at Decatur Hospital.. Felt so safe even in the middle of covid.  I wouldn't let another plastic surgeon touch me.

reviews.name: Dr Telepun is amazing
reviews.reviewBody:
Scheduled for an abdominoplasty on Oct 7th, 2019. I currently have a diastasis, hernia, and extra skin. I'm tired of looking 4 months pregnant no matter how much weight I lose. Life is too short to be unhappy!



Just ready to be snatched! Everything is in position. About to pay for the procedure tomorrow and pre-op is this Thursday!!



Anxious about the pain after. Anxious about how my kids...

reviews.name: Wonderful Physican, I Couldn’t Be Happier with my Results
reviews.reviewBody: He’s Awesome & Professional... His Staff are great too:) He follows up with you & really seems to enjoy his work... He generally cares about his patients & is very detailed oriented... I highly recommend him!!!

reviews.name: Results are amazing!
reviews.reviewBody:
Dr. Telephon is an amazing surgeon and the most conscientious physician that I have ever seen.
His staff is also superior.  I was a patient of Dr. Dunnegan’s until he passed away. I am so glad that I drove from Huntsville to Decatur to have my breast uplift and mini tummy tuck. I am in my early 60’s and never dreamed that I could ever look so good!

reviews.name: 33 3 Kids Including Twins
reviews.reviewBody: Well I decided to get a tummy tuck and had the surgery already on Jan 31st and I must say the pain was really at a minimum.  The only thing that hurted  was the gas that I couldn't pass even after taking gas x.  Today made a week and I am down to one drainage tube.  I also have had some lower back pain but nothing the pain medicine couldn't cure.   I went to Dr. Telepun and him and his staff...

reviews.name: 40 year old mom-of-2, skin-only tummy tuck with breast augmentation - 3 weeks PO
reviews.reviewBody: I’ve wanted to fix my mummy tummy for the past 20 years, so my 40th birthday present to myself was a mommy makeover! It has been less than 3 weeks since my surgery and I am already beyond thrilled with my results!! I can’t wait to see the final results after all swelling has subsided and my implants drop and fluff! The tummy tuck recovery has been a breeze since no muscle repair was inv...

reviews.name: So Happy with my Results!
reviews.reviewBody: My experience with Dr Core and his entire staff was outstanding. I was so nervous about having elective surgery and he and his team helped ease my fears. My breast augmentation turned out exactly how I wanted it. I had a fear that they would be larger than what I envisioned, but Dr Core is amazing at what he does and knew what would look best on my body. He also did my upper and lower lids, as...

reviews.name: Absolutely the Best.
reviews.reviewBody: Dr. Core is amazing. When I went for a consult he answered the questions I had but then later I had more. I called his office expecting a nurse to call me back. Dr. Core called personally and spent well over 30 minutes explaining everything.  I had a tummy tuck. Something I have wanted since I was 10 years old.  I am now 50.  I thought it would only impact my appearance and my confidence.  The...

reviews.name: Recommend!
reviews.reviewBody: I told Dr. Core that I wanted my breast aug to look natural, and just restore volume that was lost after babies/breastfeeding. I am very happy with my results! I highly recommend. And I love his nurse! Grandview hospital is also amazing!

reviews.name: Gave Me the Confidence I Had Been Searching For!
reviews.reviewBody: Dr. Grady Core....what can I say? He is the  consummate professional who strives for perfection. From the moment you enter his well appointed office, you are treated with nothing but kindness and respect. The staff is so kind and caring and you are treated like a friend as well as a patient. He as done multiple procedures on me, and each outcome has exceeded my expectations. However, the one...

location: 4300 W. Main St., Ste. 43, Dothan, Alabama

reviews.name: Perfectly Amazing !
reviews.reviewBody: Consultation was cool, could have had procedure the following week but required to be vape free for a month! Pre~and post Op in ur own room(unlike other place around). He did just what I wanted- took my ugly pudgy flanks and filled in my dips so relieved knowing jeans will fit better! Surgeons fee’ facility cost’ anesthesiologist’ and follow up’s all included in quote—Unlike Mia advertise...

reviews.name: Bilateral mastectomy w/reconstruction surgery and nipple reconstruction
reviews.reviewBody:
I had a bilateral mastectomy w/reconstruction surgery and nipple reconstruction. I would highly recommend Dr. Owen's. 
Dr. Owen's and his staff have been so wonderful through my whole process. He definitely takes time to example things to you. I just love Dr. Owen's and his staff. I came out very pleased with how well everything turned out.

reviews.name: Would recommend to anyone needing any type plastic surgery
reviews.reviewBody: Dr. Owen and his staff are wonderful. They are very helpful and caring and courteous. They answer all your questions.  I would recommend Dr. Owen to anyone needing any type plastic surgery. Great team!

reviews.name: Dr. Owen and his staff are wonderful
reviews.reviewBody:
What can I say....Dr. Owen and his staff are wonderful. They made me feel comfortable and answered all my questions.  I recently had a tummy tuck and and few years before I also had a beast reduction both by him. I look and feel amazing...thank you Dr. Owen for giving me back my confidence. 
S. Wimberly

reviews.name: So happy with my experience! I feel like a new person
reviews.reviewBody: I went into Dr. Owens office to get a consultation for a tummy tuck. Since the beginning he was very upfront with what he thought would be best for my body to give me the look I wanted. We decided the belt lipectomy was best. I was not forced to change what I wanted done, Dr. Owen went into full detail and spoke to me for about an hour about my options.We took pictures and got me scheduled. He...

name: Michael Clinton, MD
location: 7191 Cahaba Valley Rd., Ste. 200, Birmingham, Alabama

reviews.name: 39, 2 Breast Fed Babies Later and Always Had Large Boobs. Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: Best thing I ever did for myself!  Had buyers remorse from the pain on about day 3, which my doctor warned me about,  but would not change my decision now.  I have a lollipop scar not the typical anchor scar you see with this procedure.  My implants are small b/c I didn't need the size except at the top of my breast and the implants are under the muscle.

reviews.name: Neck Pain with a Much Needed Breast Reduction - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: After many trips to doctors for severe neck pain it was suggested to me a breast reduction. My size then was 34H cup and now I am a 36C or D cup depending on the bra. This was the best decision I've ever made. I'm 47 and have perfect perky breast. Right after the procedure I went back to work within a week. I was cut from under one side to the other side under each breast because of the size...

reviews.name: 37 Years Old, 2 Kids, Having Mommy Makeover with Hernia Repair - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I am having MM on November 18th and I am so exited,I am having a BA and lift, TT with muscle and hernia repair and lipo to flanks,I am 5'6, weight 149, trying to get to at least 145 before surgery, my normal weight is about 130,I gained 70 pounds with my first pregnancy and 50 pounds with the second, yep I was a hungry girl, lol,I lost all of the weight by working out and counting calories but...

reviews.name: Mommy Makeover - Birmingham, AL
reviews.reviewBody: I went in for a consultation with Dr.Clinton because I have had two kids, have breastfed, and was not happy with my body anymore. I am a small person and did not really have much fat but I did have a lot of loose skin on my stomach and my breast were looking like deflated balloons. Dr. Clinton preformed a tummy tuck, a breast lift with implants, and a little bit of smart lipo on my lower back!...

reviews.name: Slim Lipo and Liposuction of the Chin/neck/abdomen/flanks/lower back
reviews.reviewBody: I have thought about liposuction (and every other medical procedure) off an on my whole adult life. I turned 37 this year and gave birth to my third child at the end of June of this year, 2013. I've touted "au natural" for a long time and I've been 98 lbs (I'm 5 foot nuthin') and I've been 152 lbs. I originally went in just to get my double chin looked at. My double chin never goes away unless...

reviews.name: I drew the genetic short stick when it comes to my jaw line
reviews.reviewBody: I drew the genetic short stick when it comes to my jaw line. Due to genetics i have a “double chin.” Even at my lowest weight i have sported this double chin. I was thrilled to find out i was a candidate for cool sculpting! Dr. Grottings nurse, Jennifer, that assists with the cool sculpting procedure has the best bedside manner and is very knowledgeable about Cool sculpting. She explained to ...

reviews.name: Small BA on 21 Y/o with No Children- 240 cc Moderate Silicone
reviews.reviewBody: I am scheduled for my procedure next week and am so excited! I am currently LESS than a 32A. I have always wanted boobs and now will finally have them! I specifically do NOT want big boobs, as I have a tiny frame and just want something proportional, natural-looking, and feminine. Therefore I have decided to go with the 220 cc low profile silicone implants. I decided between these or 235 cc...

reviews.name: Lower eyelid surgery to remove dark circles and bags, was sick of looking tired all the time.
reviews.reviewBody: Wanted to remove dark circles and bags, was sick of looking tired all the time. Was ready for a new fresh look. Went to visit Dr. Grotting and his staff. He and his staff were all around A+. I had my lower eyelid surgery just a little over a week ago and am already loving the results. Cannot wait for a few weeks down the road to see the final results. Definitely would recommend Dr. Grotting to...

reviews.name: Incredible. He’s a true artist
reviews.reviewBody: This man is amazing. He’s a true artist and did such a fantastic job on my breast augmentation. I’m beyond appreciative of the detail he put into speaking with me, the procedure, and far after my surgery. He also doesn’t try to sell you on anything, make a consultation with him if you’re considering a procedure and trust that he will tell you the truth and not just be looking out for his poc...

reviews.name: Long Overdue Tummy Tuck
reviews.reviewBody: Had my TT and Lipo on flanks last week on 1/31.  Feeling pretty good.  Only have pain when transitioning from sitting to standing.  Only taking pain meds at night now; taking tylenol during the day to take the edge off the pain/discomfort.   I love being able to connect and ask questions on here about anything and everything.   Hugs everyone!

name: Michael D. Yates, MD
location: 303 Williams Ave. SW, Ste. 1421 , Huntsville, Alabama

reviews.name: From a very full G cup to a C cup and the relief was immediate
reviews.reviewBody: OK so i've beenplanning this for 6 months: Breast reduction & TT with lipo of back, flanks, and bra-fat area. This was my present to myself for my 40th b'day and its definitely the best things I've ever done for myself! I'm 4 days post-op and i would say my pain has never been above a 2 on the pain scale. The lipo feels like a bad sunburn, the breast reduction feels like NOTHING. I kid you...

reviews.name: 1 year post mommy makeover/breast reduction - got results I wanted
reviews.reviewBody: My mommy makeover with breast reduction went great. Love dr yates work. I was happy to get the results I wanted. He gave me the best of care and was very careful to inform me on the results I would get. No surprises. He has a great bedside manner. Very concerned and listens to what you want and gives you his best opinion whether he thinks he can give that to you. Which I loved.

reviews.name: Dr.Yates was very informative and helped me pick out the perfect size for my frame
reviews.reviewBody: Dr.Yates was very informative and helped me pick out the perfect size for my frame, knowing I wanted to go bigger but still look natural. Post surgery he has called me every day to check on me and to answer any questions I have.

reviews.name: So Happy with Result!
reviews.reviewBody: I had 371 silicone breast implants placed in 2011. I had asked for a full C cup, but initially had a D even after the swelling went down. Over the past few years I gained a little weight and probably some breast tissue and ended up with DD cups. I have a relatively small frame. I am 5'4" and 135 lbs. My boobs overpowered me and made me look even heavier than I am. I hated myself in clothes and...

reviews.name: My experience was wonderful
reviews.reviewBody: My experience with Dr. Yates was pleasant, informative and reassuring during my breast reconstruction. From the date of mastectomy to implantation.....it was ALL GOOD !!!!His staff is knowledgeable and efficient.....and he treated me like a princess......with dignity!!!!!☺
